snippet.title: World Without Reason - Fear the Reaper
snippet.description:
World Without Reason is set in the year 2051, on a southeastern island city-state called Calloway City. The story follows a young woman in her early 20s as she tries to solve the mystery of the "Shadow Reaper". Along the way, she gets pulled back in time to relive several key moments from her childhood, which allows her to progressively uncover the truth of the case. 

The protagonist finds herself in the epicenter of a series of strange incidents afflicting Calloway City. She operates under several aliases throughout the story, but by the time she's dragged into the police station for questioning, she can't recall much of anything. Over the course of the game, the player slowly finds out how she is connected to the Shadow Reaper case.

This visual novel is made using the Ren'Py engine, and is slated to release in the Summer of 2024.

The demo is available for download on Steam.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2811960/World_Without_Reason/

-------

Music Used:

Bell Kalengar
https://bellkalengar.itch.io/dreamy-music-box
https://bellkalengar.itch.io/bossa-nova
https://bellkalengar.itch.io/haunted-soundscapes

Fesliyan Studios
https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/gunfingers/2598
